page.title: 19FASHION
page.content: Fashion these days consists of mostly bright eye-catching colours or pastel shades. Boys wear tight jeans or "baggies"-which are often grey and faded,loose around the legs and tight at the ankles. Flared trousers are not in fashion.Nike shoes and windcheaters are popular in bright colours. Girls often wear pastel colours in dresses,trousers and shorts.The mini skirt seems to be making a come back. Make up and jewelry are available in all fashion colours. Shoes have gone from the pixie boot style to canvas shoes in all bright and pastel colours. Hair which is quite short down the back but adventurous on top is popular.Hair gel and coloured sprays are used to get distinctive designs though the "tail" seems to be fading.
